com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra

Class Cassandra

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.Cassandra

  • public class Cassandra
extends Object
    Simple class for running an Embedded Cassandra. 
    public class CassandraTests {
        @Test
        public void test() throws IOException {
                Cassandra cassandra = new Cassandra();
                try {
                        cassandra.start();
                        CqlScriptUtils.executeScripts(cassandra.getSession(), new ClassPathCqlScript("init.cql"));
                        // test me
        }
                finally {
                        cassandra.stop();
        }
    }
 }
    Author:
    Dmytro Nosan
    See Also:
    RuntimeConfigBuilder, ExecutableConfigBuilder, ClusterFactory, CqlScriptUtils

      • getCluster

        public com.datastax.driver.core.Cluster getCluster()
        Lazy initialize Cassandra's Cluster using ClusterFactory. Note! This method must be called only after start() method.
        Returns:
        Cassandra's Cluster.
        See Also:
        ClusterFactory

      • getSession

        public com.datastax.driver.core.Session getSession()
        Lazy initialize Cassandra's Session using Cluster. Note! This method must be called only after start() method.
        Returns:
        Cassandra's Session
        See Also:
        getCluster()

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the Cassandra. Session and Cluster will not be initialized. This method registers a shutdown hook if IRuntimeConfig.isDaemonProcess() was set as a true.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the Cassandra and cleans/closes all related resources.
